"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b23d8e636872548d0b0200#post_53b23d8e636872548d0b0200
Hey its all good. You're free to like your stuff, and we're free to prefer ours. As long as it makes you happy that's all that matters.

Me I can't get into ferals unless they are sapient (like ponies). I need something distinctly human to latch onto in order to desire a character, even if it is simply a lovable personality.
